name: MEC Aquanator Pants - Youths
description:
For wet days at camp or enjoying recess on a muddy field, these pull-on rain pants are a ticket to Drytown. A full-length inner mesh lining keeps them from sticking to your legs or feeling clammy. Taped seams prevent water from working its way in during full-tilt activity.Made of 75-denier polyester with a polyurethane coating and a highly effective DWR finish that offer full-on weather protection.Fully lined in polyester mesh for next-to-skin comfort.Taped seams are completely waterproof.Elasticized pull-on waist.Interior name label so you know whose is whose.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
